# Dropdown Menu Item

## Usage:

```html
<p-dropdown-menu-item>Content</p-dropdown-menu-item>
```

| Property | Attribute | Description                             | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |

| `icon`   | `icon`    | Icon of the navigation item             | `"arrow" \| "attachment" \| "bread" \| "calendar" \| "car" \| "checklist" \| "checkmark" \| "chevron" \| "clock" \| "cogs" \| "comment" \| "document" \| "download" \| "envelope" \| "explanation" \| "eye" \| "filter" \| "folder" \| "grid" \| "headset" \| "integration" \| "list" \| "location" \| "megaphone" \| "menu" \| "minus" \| "more" \| "negative" \| "pagination" \| "payment" \| "pencil" \| "person" \| "plus" \| "question" \| "receipt" \| "report" \| "search" \| "settings" \| "sick" \| "signout" \| "switch" \| "tachometer" \| "task" \| "template" \| "tool" \| "trash" \| "turn" \| "upload" \| "warning"` | `undefined` |
